name: Lonely Purple Boi
description:
this game is about the little boi who is lonely and purple 

if you finished the game you can comment something ( it's not even a game but that's ok.)

Move = W/S , A/D   --   okay

Jump = Space      -    oh you can jump yayyy

DoubleJump = 2xSpace   -     no no no NO waY ??  ? ? ? ?? ? ? ??????????????

-- You can wallslide and walljump in this game-- Awesome !!!11!!!!
